title: cmd/gc: Better wording on constant declaration
body:
I feel like the error "constdcl cannot have type without expr"
(http://play.golang.org/p/2ZfUB25LNN) is not in line with most of the compile errors.
Normally, the compile errors have full words and (concise) explanations. 

Secondly, if that is going to get fixed, the syntax error in
http://play.golang.org/p/2lIqNtMJG2 could probably also be improved to say something
about needing to have an expression in the constant declaration.
